SYSTEM: Ontologies-TheoreticalAspects.pdf: Página 30
©Asunción Gómez-Pérez
30
Domain and Range of Properties
 When defining a domain or range find the most general class or classes 
 The domain of flavor should be Wine and not Red wine or White wine
 The range of produces for a Winery should be Wine and not Red, White or 
Rosé wine
 General patterns
 A class and a superclass – replace with the superclass
 All subclasses of a class – replace with the superclass
 Most subclasses of a class – consider replacing with the superclass
speaker: SYSTEM
